name: Amulet of Trebor
description:
You have been chosen by your kingdom to delve into Ye Dungeon and recover the Amulet of Trebor, a powerful artifact that will alter the balance of power between good and evil. This will be a difficult quest, as Ye Dungeon is crawling with all manner of evil creatures.   Fortunately, there is a town near the entrance with shopkeepers that will be happy to provide the necessary equipment, weapons and armor you will need to succeed in your quest. Be brave, young adventurer and GOOD LUCK! 

(you'll need it....)

A First Person Roguelike that uses a retro style of movement and combat, visualizing the quest using a Wolfenstein 3D styled view with atmospheric touches. 

Please support my game to encourage further development.  Magic, NPC's, Quests, outside the Castle, and more features to be added!
